content: Indeed, it is unfortunate how colonialism and outside influence have had a detrimental effect on many indigenous cultures, including the Rapa Nui people. However, there is hope for the future as many native communities, including the Rapa Nui, are actively working towards reclaiming their heritage and preserving their traditions. It is essential to recognize and respect the cultural diversity and richness that exists in our world, and support efforts to protect and celebrate it.
